EmailTemplate.name: 2017_Global_Nurture_Jetwave_BGA.201709_Global_Nurture_Jetwave_BGA
EmailTemplate.subject: Say Good-Bye to Buffering, Dropped Calls and Wi-Fi Dead Zones!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> No More Boring Flights, Thanks to JetWave <[[https://youtu.be/XKSXeNnEoI0]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Remember the days when the only inflight entertainment options you had were the safety card and heavy magazines?!? Yeah, neither do we. Inflight Wi-Fi has revolutionized aviation, and completely changed the passenger experience.
Honeywell’s JetWave™ system, which powers Inmarsat's Jet ConneX service, means never being out of touch, even in flight.
Want to stream your favorite movie? No problem. Need to catch up on emails, presentations and video conferences? No sweat. Want to FaceTime with your family? You bet. You can even watch cat videos <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=2&v=XKSXeNnEoI0]]>!
Honeywell’s suite of connectivity services and solutions transforms your aircraft cabin into your office, your home theater, your music studio – whatever you want. Explore the Power of Connected with Honeywell.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
